long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cosmic Space Tab is an awe-inspiring Chrome extension that brings the vast wonders of space right to your fingertips. With Cosmic Space Tab, you can embark on an incredible journey through the cosmos without leaving the comfort of your browser. Immerse yourself in the captivating beauty and mysteries of space with live feeds and videos.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Cosmic Space Tab extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

Cosmic Space Tab provides you with an extraordinary window into the universe, delivering live feeds and videos from various space agencies, observatories, and telescopes around the world. Witness celestial events as they happen, from mesmerizing meteor showers and stunning planetary alignments to captivating views of distant galaxies and nebulae. Stay connected to the wonders of space in real-time.
